column1: #text=Flying in an airplane can be a stressful event for some people , but In essence it 's a simple process .
#text=You will need to purchase tickets ahead of time to a destination of your choosing .
#text=Once you decide on your trip , and book any accomodations , you will just need to show up to your airport at least 2 hours in advance .
#text=It 's important to show up early to prevent rushing , and make sure you get through security in a timely manner .
#text=Make sure you bring a comfy neck pillow in your carry on , and purchase any beverages after you go through security to take on the plane with you .
#text=Once through security you can head to your gate and wait until your flight starts boarding .
#text=When your section is called you can enter the plane , stow away your carry on , and sit back and relax .
#text=The rest of the work will be done for you , and you can feel free to take a nap or watch an in-flight movie .
#text=When you arrive at your destination they will have everyone exit the plane , and your vacation can really begin !
